A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terrible direction\, mishandled a lot of character\, countless plot holes\, probably the dumbest scene in all of stars Wars yes even dumber than why Anakin hates sand. I'm a huge Star Wars fan and the more I think about this movie the more I hate it. It felt like watching the prequels again with all the terrible writing and cringy dialogue\, this is probably the worst one in the series\, yes worse than Attack of the Clones. It was so disappointing.
